constraints.validationMessage: The Domain UID must be between 3 and 20 characters long and contain letters, numbers and -.

elements.name: enableLBSVC
elements.label: Create Standard Load Balancer services for the cluster?
elements.toolTip: Select 'Yes' to create Standard Load Balancer services for the cluster.

validations.message: Only alphanumeric characters are allowed, and the value must be 1-30 characters long.
Only numbers are allowed, and the value must be 1-65535.

elements.name: enableAppGateway
elements.label: Connect to Azure Application Gateway?
elements.toolTip: Select 'Yes' to create an Azure Application Gateway Ingress as the load balancer for the cluster and admin server.

options.text: Choose an option for providing the TLS/SSL certificate:
⁃ Upload a TLS/SSL certificate: Upload the pre-signed certificate now.
⁃ Identify an Azure Key Vault: The Key Vault must already contain the certificate and its password stored as secrets.
⁃ Generate a self-signed certificate: generate a self-signed certificate and apply it during deployment.

elements.name: certificateOption
elements.label: Select desired TLS/SSL certificate option
elements.toolTip: Select desired TLS/SSL certificate option

elements.name: keyVaultSSLCertData
elements.label: TLS/SSL certificate(.pfx)
elements.toolTip: TLS/SSL certificate used for App Gateway

elements.name: appGatewaySSLCertPassword
elements.toolTip: TLS/SSL certificate password

constraints.validationMessage: The password must contain at least 6 characters, with at least 1 uppercase letter, 1 lowercase letter and 1 number.

elements.name: keyVaultResourceGroup
elements.label: Resource group name in current subscription containing the Key Vault
elements.toolTip: Use only letters and numbers

constraints.validationMessage: [if(greater(length(steps('section_appGateway').appgwIngress.keyVaultResourceGroup), 90),'Resource group names only allow up to 90 characters.', 'Resource group names only allow alphanumeric characters, periods, underscores, hyphens and parenthesis and cannot end in a period.')]

elements.name: keyVaultName
elements.label: Name of the Azure Key Vault containing secrets for the certificate for TLS/SSL Termination
elements.toolTip: Use only letters and numbers

constraints.validationMessage: [if(or(greater(length(steps('section_appGateway').appgwIngress.keyVaultName), 24), less(length(steps('section_appGateway').appgwIngress.keyVaultName), 3)),'Vault name must be between 3-24 alphanumeric characters. The name must begin with a letter, end with a letter or digit, and not contain consecutive hyphens.','Vault name must only contain alphanumeric characters and dashes and cannot start with a number')]

elements.name: keyVaultSSLCertDataSecretName
elements.label: The name of the secret in the specified Key Vault whose value is the TLS/SSL certificate data
elements.toolTip: Use only letters and numbers

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be 1-30 characters long and must only contain letters and numbers.

elements.name: keyVaultSSLCertPasswordSecretName
elements.label: The name of the secret in the specified Key Vault whose value is the password for the TLS/SSL certificate
elements.toolTip: Use only letters and numbers

constraints.validationMessage: The value must be 1-30 characters long and must only contain letters and numbers.

elements.name: servicePrincipal

elements.toolTip: Select 'Yes' to configure Custom DNS Alias.

elements.label: Use an existing Azure DNS Zone
elements.toolTip: Select 'Yes' to configure Custom DNS Alias based on an existing Azure DNS Zone. Select 'No' to create an Azure DNS Zone and Custom DNS Alias.

elements.name: dnszoneName
elements.label: DNS Zone Name
elements.toolTip: Use only letters and numbers and periods to separate Domains

constraints.validationMessage: There must be between 2 and 34 labels. For example, "contoso.com" has 2 labels. Each label must contain between 1 and 63 characters. Each label must only contain letters, numbers, underscores, and dashes.

elements.label: Name of the resource group contains the DNS Zone in current subscription
elements.toolTip: Name of the resource group which contains the DNS Zone in current subscription

constraints.validationMessage: [if(greater(length(steps('section_appGateway').dnsConfiguration.dnsZoneResourceGroup), 90),'Resource group names only allow up to 90 characters.', 'Resource group names only allow alphanumeric characters, periods, underscores, hyphens and parenthesis and cannot end in a period.')]

elements.label: Label for Oracle WebLogic Administration Console

elements.name: dnszoneGatewayLabel
elements.label: Label for WebLogic Cluster

validations.message: Each label must contain between 1 and 63 characters. Each label must only contain letters, numbers, underscores, and dashes.
